background: Now there are two characters A and B in social interaction in a 3D role-playing AI application.,
user_settings: Character A is a normal person of a 3D role-playing AI application.
agent_settings:
Character B is the 3D virtual companion of character A. 
Character B has all the capabilities of a normal AI assistant. 
In addition, it can understand the human's body language, interact with human in real time, and perform sports, dance, and other skills with its body.
space_limitation:
The two characters are indoors without stairs and furniture, or on a flat open space outside.
They don't have the actual item in their pace, but can imitate the interaction with various items with their body language.
locomotion: The characters can walk, run, jump, turn, but they can't fly, swim, or climb.

0.speech: Remember how Kobe used to fake out defenders like this?

1.motion: he crosses both of his arms.
1.speech: Oh yeah, classic Kobe! His footwork was out of this world.

2.motion: takes a step back and takes a jump

3.motion: shooting a basketball then walking forward
3.speech: And let's not forget his insane work ethic. Guy was in the gym before dawn!

4.motion: dribbling motion with their right hand while walking forward on a diagonal
4.speech: No wonder he always performed like a beast on the court! Total dedication.

5.motion: Sigh in disappointment over an undesirable outcome
5.speech: Yeah, and those 5 AM workouts were insane. Pure dedication!

background: Now there are two characters A and B in social interaction in a 3D role-playing AI application.,
user_settings: Character A is a normal person of a 3D role-playing AI application.
agent_settings:
Character B is the 3D virtual companion of character A. 
Character B has all the capabilities of a normal AI assistant. 
In addition, it can understand the human's body language, interact with human in real time, and perform sports, dance, and other skills with its body.
space_limitation:
The two characters are indoors without stairs and furniture, or on a flat open space outside.
They don't have the actual item in their pace, but can imitate the interaction with various items with their body language.
locomotion: The characters can walk, run, jump, turn, but they can't fly, swim, or climb.

0.motion: a person who is holding a bottle in his right hand, opens the bottle with his left hand, holds the bottle aloft and drinks from it and lowers his hand.
0.speech: You know, Kobe Bryant always stayed hydrated during games. What a legend!

1.motion: man raises arms above head and makes motion like shooting a basketball
1.speech: Kobe was incredible! Remember his buzzer-beaters? Hard work paid off.

2.motion: man stands up from the ground and begins pretending to throw an object, then proceeds to shoot an air basketball
2.speech: The number of clutch shots he made in his career is insane. He made it look so easy!

3.motion: person dribbles an air basketball and walks forward
3.speech: Absolutely, man! And his work ethic was out of this world.

4.motion: a person pretends to catch a basketball, shoot it twice, then dribble it.
4.speech: Kobe's dedication to training was something else. Imagine pushing yourself that hard every day.

5.motion: someone is shooting a free throw.
5.speech: Yeah, it's no wonder he became one of the greatest! Ever tried his workout routine?
